data.title: The Enemy Papers (Enemy Mine) by Barry B. Longyear
data.meta_description:
Release date 1998 | The entire Enemy Mine series gathered in one volume:
The Talman, Enemy Mine (the expanded Nebula and Hugo Award winner that inspired the ...
data.text:
The entire Enemy Mine series gathered in one volume:

The Talman, Enemy Mine (the expanded Nebula and Hugo Award winner that inspired the 20th Century Fox motion picture starring Dennis Quid and Lou Gossett, Jr.), the novels The Tomorrow Testament and The Last Enemy, plus more.

Talma is the pat of choosing paths. The Enemy Papers is the saga of how humans and their enemies used Talma to end war.

"...this was one of those rare times when a story was so good that even I could see "Hugo" written all over it." â€“ Isaac Asimov on Enemy Mine
